title: HeidelbergCement Agrees to Buy 45 Percent of Rival Italcementi
text:
Germanyâ€™s HeidelbergCement AG agreed to buy 45 percent of rival Italcementi SpA and plans to make an offer for the remainder once the deal gets approved.
HeidelbergCement will pay about 1.67 billion euros ($1.85 billion) for the initial stake, the company said in a statement.
